File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/common.f [code]Modules that contain common variables
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/finaldump.f [code]Save relevant data at the end of the simulation run to file 'final.out'
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/hydrodynamics_f.f [code]Calculate chemical potential and density gradient
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/hydrodynamics_g.f [code]Calculate velocity and pressure using gbar
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/init.f [code]Initialize all variables and arrays and save initialized data to file
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/main.f [code]Driver for the parallel D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/memalloc.f [code]Allocate (FLAG == 1) or deallocate (FLAG != 1) memory for common arrays
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_f.f [code]Update fbar in nodes at processor boundaries using MPI
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_g.f [code]Update gbar in nodes at processor boundaries using MPI
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_hydro.f [code]Update values of the velocity and the pressure in the ghost layers
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_rho_f.f [code]Update rho_f values in the three ghost layers using MPI
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_rho_g.f [code]Update rho values in the two ghost layers using MPI
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/parameters.f [code]Read input parameters and define simulation constants
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/poststream_f.f [code]Post-Stream step for distribution function f
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/poststream_g.f [code]Post-Stream step for distribution function g
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/prestream_f.f [code]Pre-Stream and Stream steps for distribution function f
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/prestream_g.f [code]Pre-Stream and Stream steps for distribution function g
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/stats.f [code]Calculate intermediate simulation results and save to file 'stats.out'
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/update_f.f [code]Update velocity and pressure in the order parameter grid
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/update_g.f [code]Update density and its differentials in the pressure/momentum grid
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/vgrid.f [code]Creates a virtual cartesian grid (2D) linking all MPI-allocated processors
src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/vtkplane.f [code]Save simulation data in VTK format
